Package controller

Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
controller.GameEngine
public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
Game Engine class is the starting point of the game where commands are processed and extracted to support the functionalities provided by the commands.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    controller.LogEntryBuffer d_logEntryBuffer  
    entities.Player d_neutralPlayer  
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> d_playerName  
    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​entities.Player> d_players  
    java.util.Random d_random  
    controller.UserCommand d_userCommand  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    GameEngine()
    Game Engine constructor which creates a neutral player when game is started and also initializes LogEntryBuffer which is observable and attaches it to LogWriter.
